title: Token name structure
description: Control what parts are included in the exporter token name.

collectionPathAndName.label: Collection + Path + Name
collectionPathAndName.description: Include collection, path, and name (e.g. CoreButtonPrimaryBackground)

title: Use token references
description: Values will use references to other tokens (where applicable).

title: Export only themed tokens
description: Theme files will only include tokens that have different values from the base value.

title: Export base values
description: Base token values will be exported along with themes.

title: Generate index files
description: Generate files with imports for all base and theme token files.

title: Index filename
description: The name of the index file that will be generated.

title: Package prefix name
description: Beginning of the package name tokens are exported to

title: File structure
description: Control how token variables are organized in files

separateByType.label: Separate files by type
separateByType.description: Generate separate files for each token type

singleFile.label: Single combined file
singleFile.description: Generate one file containing all token types

title: Name of the single combined file
description: File and object name where all tokens are exported (e.g. 'DesignTokens').

title: Path to non-themed files
description: All files without themes will be written to this directory (relative to export root).

title: Customize token file names
description: Customize the file names for each token type.

title: Token file names
description: Name of each file that will be generated, grouped by token type.

title: Generate empty token files
description: Generate empty token files instead of omitting them.

title: Global prefix
description: Prefix all variable names (e.g., 'MyToken').

title: Customize type prefixes
description: Customize the prefixes for each design token type.

title: Token prefixes
description: Each token of a specific type is prefixed with the following identifier.

title: Show token descriptions
description: Show the token description as a code comment for every exported token.

title: Show file disclaimer
description: A message explaining that the file was automatically generated will appear in all token files.

default:
This file was generated automatically by Supernova.io and should not be changed manually.
To modify the format or content of this file, please contact your design system team.
title: Disclaimer message
description: A message explaining that the file was automatically generated will appear in all token files.

title: Indentation
description: Number of spaces used in generated Kotlin files.

title: Write generated variable names
description: Save generated variable names back to tokens as custom properties.

title: Custom property name
description: Name of the custom property where generated variable names will be saved.
